name: Cat Adoption Questionnaire
description:
Notes: 

- Adoption is currently only available to Victorian residents.
- This form will take approximately 10-15 minutes to complete.
footer:
By submitting this form, you declare that all details are accurate to the best of your knowledge.

Upon review and approval, Homeless Hounds will contact you as soon as possible. We reserve the right to refuse any applicant.

We will require the successful applicant to sign an adoption agreement, provide pictures of the yard as you have described above and allowed for a yard check before adoption.

We appreciate you taking the time to complete this application.

fields.name: your_local_council_vic_only
fields.label: Your Local Council (VIC Only)

fields.name: questions_about_your_lifestyle
fields.label: Questions about your Lifestyle

fields.name: q15
fields.label: 1. Please tell us more about yourself, your lifestyle and your household? What will the average day for your cat look like?

fields.name: q16
fields.label: 2. Do have children under 15 that will live with or have regular contact with the cat?

fields.name: q17
fields.label: 2.1 If "yes", what are the ages of children (under 15) that will live with or have regular contact with the cat?

fields.name: q18
fields.label: 2.2 If "yes", have the above mentioned children lived with or had regular contact with cats before?

fields.name: q19
fields.label: 3. Do you currently or have you previously owned a cat, dog or other animals?

fields.name: q20
fields.label: 3.1 If yes, please give details - e.g. number, breed, sex, age and whether or not they’re still in your care.

fields.name: q21
fields.label: 3.1 If no, have you previously owned any cats or other animals? Please give details.

fields.name: q22
fields.label: 4. Will the cat have regular contact with elderly people, dogs or livestock? Please specify.

fields.name: q23
fields.label: 4.1 If "dogs" or "livestock", please elaborate e.g. type, breed, age, gender, desexed, parasite control, vaccinations etc. Are they social w…

fields.name: q24
fields.label: 4.2 If you have a dog, has it lived with a cat before? If not, has it met a cat and what was its reaction?

fields.name: q25
fields.label: 5. Will your cat be an:

fields.name: q26
fields.label: 5.1 If "both", please elaborate e.g. using a cat door, being let in and out etc.

fields.name: q27
fields.label: 6. Do you have any experience with fostering animals?

fields.name: q28
fields.label: 6.1 If "yes", please elaborate.

fields.name: q29
fields.label: 7. Do you have a cat door or cat enclosure? (please select most appropriate)

fields.name: q30
fields.label: 8. If you adopt this cat, how soon can you pick him/her up?

fields.name: q31
fields.label: 9. To the best of your knowledge, is anyone in your house allergic to cats?

fields.name: q32
fields.label: 9.1 If "yes", please elaborate e.g. which family members, what sorts of allergies etc.

fields.name: q33
fields.label: 10. If you’re renting, do you have your Landlord’s approval to have a pet?

fields.name: q34
fields.label: 11. Do you agree to return the cat to Homeless Hounds should your circumstances change or the cat not settle in as hoped?

fields.name: q35
fields.label: 12. Would you be interested in fostering with a view to adoption possibly suitable cats?

fields.name: q36
fields.label: 13. If this cat isn't suitable, would you like us to suggest other options?

fields.name: q37
fields.label: 14. Are you an Australian Citizen or Permanent Resident?

fields.name: would_you_like_to_receive_news_and_updat
fields.label: Would you like to receive News and Updates from Homeless Hounds? You can opt-out at any time.
